summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Fifty-first Street from Interlake Avenue to Meridian Avenue et al in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 22479, creating Local Improvement District No. 2213 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
